**First of all, let us gather together to wish GreenCloud a happy 8th anniversary!**

After a year of hard effort, we are more than excited to provide new locations for Ryzen VPS, macOS VPS, and Singapore DC2 expansion, and we have received positive feedback from customers. A [YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCRPhJbwWki4ilzbhtYH_O2Q "YouTube channel") and online tutorials at [GreenCloud Docs](https://green.cloud/docs/ "GreenCloud Docs") are also in the works to help users.

As GreenCloud is getting older and older each year, we are trying to bring more favorable deals to our valued customers and followers. So let see how GreenCloud is planning to do our 8th-year anniversary with special offers.

1. For coupon codes please refer to: https://greencloudvps.com/greencloud-8th-birthday-sale.php

2. Special plans with up to 88% OFF RECURRING will be updated here: https://greencloudvps.com/billing/store/8th-birthday-sale

For example:
**8888 Birthday SG - $88/Triennially**

    - 8GB RAM
    - 88GB NVMe RAID-10 SSD
    - 8 fair-share cores Xeon Gold @ 2.6GHz+ CPU
    - 1 IPv4
    - /112 IPv6
    - 8TB Bandwidth
    - 10Gbps Port
    - Linux OS
    - Singapore DC2 Location
    - SolusVM Control Panel

All of these codes are valid from October 27th until November 3rd, 2021. Be quick as it’s for a limited time only. Please note that no refund/money back on these above plans. Hope you will enjoy this celebration just like we do!

The first 8 comments in this thread with 
# #GreenCloud8thBirthday
will receive $20 in account credit. Please note that the account will need to be at least 1 month old.
